sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with mu ji 目疾 , ailments of the eyes. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry lu gan shi 爐甘 石 quotes Zhang shi fang 張氏方 : 目中諸病：石連光明散 , “For all types of diseases in the eyes , [use] the powder with [ lu gan ] shi and [ huang ] lian to brighten vision”.
